channel.title: hair styles on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in hair styles on Life At The Circus

item.title: A Perfect 10!
item.description: One day my 4 year old came to me with about 8 pony tail holders and asked me to put them all in her hair. I was surprised with how cute it turned out and she was excited when she received compliments on it from her friend at church. After realizing how well it stayed in, I decided it might be worth trying this for gymnastics. (this is it after a night of sleep)
